about.name: Volodymyr Huk
about.title: Senior Full stack Developer
about.subTitle: I'm good at both frontend and backend website development
about.description1: Forward-thinking full-stack software engineer with 8+ years of experience developing web and mobile applications and back-end systems.
about.description2: Highly experienced in all aspects of the software development lifecycle and end-toend project management, from concept through to development and delivery.
about.description3: Proficient in writing reusable, testable, and efficient code to develop scalable, secure, and high-performance applications.

experience.summary: Freelancehunt is the most popular freelance service in Ukraine. The main focus of the marketplace is all areas in which remote cooperation.
bulletPoints: Developed reusable React components and custom hooks, resulting in a 50% reduction in development efforts across 3 different projects.
Improved loading times by 30% and enhanced overall performance by implementing caching techniques, browser optimization techniques, and GZIP compression.
Engineered the migration of a monolith GraphQL API to microservices architecture using Apollo Federation and Nest.js.
Enabled high scalability and agility by integrating AWS technology (Lambda, ECS Fargate) and infrastructure code frameworks (Terraform, Serverless).
Translated business requirements into technical specifications by applying in-depth knowledge of software development life cycle.

experience.summary: Torgsoft has compiled a rating of the largest marketplaces in Ukraine based on the Ukrainian Business Award research in 2023.
bulletPoints: Implemented customer-facing user interface (UI) and back-end services for various business processes, including calendar integration, metrics, discounts, stripe integration, and client rescheduling.
Built 10+ custom React hooks for sharing reusable logic between functional components.
Enhanced user experiences (UX) by updating 20+ components to match the latest design style guide, while adding animations to refresh the mobile appâ€™s overall look and feel.
Collaborated with design and development teams to revamp the product's visual identity and improve user experience by implementing new design patterns and animations.

experience.summary: Computools is an IT Consulting and Custom Software Development Company that designs solutions to help companies meet the needs of tomorrow.
bulletPoints: Streamlined processes by coordinating the transfer of 2,000+ entries of financial data from worldwide production subsidiaries to a single webbased reporting tool.
Developed 3 cross-platform web apps and web backend using diverse technology stacks such as JavaScript, React, Node, and PHP, leading to increased efficiency.
Onboarded 8 new developers and provided guidance on setting up development environment.
Reviewed code from junior engineers, made improvement suggestions, and established and promoted development guidelines, best practices, and standards.

portfolios.title: Strapi Starter
portfolios.description: Strapi Community Edition is a free and open-source headless CMS enabling you to manage any content, anywhere. This project was started with love by Trecia, Daniel and Paul. We were all new to Next 14 and Typescript. If you find any bugs or improvements feel free to create an issue.

education.name: Ivan Franko National University of Lviv

bulletPoints: I am not just committed to my own development.
I also care about helping other developers improve.
I am willing to teach, answer questions, and write documentation that favors teammates both in their business and in the wider developer community
Good time management allows me to accomplish more in a shorter period of time
It makes me take advantage of learning opportunities and helps me focus, which leads to more career success.
I am not afraid to offer new ideas for projects, workflow, or client's culture.
I do not hesitate to ask for help or guidance if I find something unclear
